name: Buddy Mission Bond
overview: Buddy Mission BOND is an adventure game released for the Nintendo Switch in 2021. It is developed by Koei Tecmo and published by Nintendo with character design by Yusuke Murata, manga author of Eyeshield 21 and One-Punch Man. The game is a visual novel with two phases in each of the game's missions. The first part requires the player to choose two of the Team Bond members (consisting of Luke, Aaron, Mokuma, and Chesley) to form a pair of buddies who look for clues and interview citizens. The second phase has the buddies infiltrate the villain's base, the route of which depends on the clues found in the first phase.
